text.textblock: Garnishment of Federal Employees Wages for Payment of Debt

summary.textblock: The Department of State is giving notice that all requests for payments pursuant to court-ordered garnishments as authorized under section 9 of Public Law No. 103-94, Hatch Act Reform Amendments of 1993, for all employees of the Department of State shall be submitted to the Executive Director (L/EX), Office of the Legal Adviser, Department of State, room 5519A, 22nd and C Streets NW., Washington, DC 20520, (202) 647-8323. This is the same agent designated for service of garnishments under 5 CFR part 581.

The Executive Director of the Office of the Legal Adviser, Department of State, is not authorized to accept requests for payments pursuant to court-ordered garnishments for employees of any other Federal agency, and any such requests submitted will be returned.

address.textblock: Comments regarding this notice should be sent to the Assistant Legal Adviser for Legislation and General Management (L/LM), Office of the Legal Adviser, Department of State, room 5425, 22nd and C Streets NW., Washington, DC 20520.

supplem.textblock: Congress has authorized the garnishment of Federal civilian employees' wages for debts pursuant to section 9 of Public Law 103-94, Hatch Act Reform Amendments of 1993. The applications and orders and legal issues related thereto will be reviewed by the Office of the Legal Adviser.

signjob.textblock: Assistant Legal Adviser for Legislation and General Management.
